jvelociter joined #xwiki at 23:41  
jumpkick joined #xwiki at 23:52  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:52): hi everyone  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:52): is it possible to have subfolders within spaces?  
sdumitriu - (10/05/2009 23:53): Hi jumpkick  
sdumitriu - (10/05/2009 23:53): No, not yet  
sdumitriu - (10/05/2009 23:54): And I think not in the near future  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:54): hmm... okay, I guess I can tag pages and then write some kind of thing to display them by tags  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:54): I'll do velocity macro or something  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:55): Is there any other way to group pages besides spaces?  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:55): (we are thinking of grouping general, projects, and infrastructure pages in a per client space)  
sdumitriu - (10/05/2009 23:56): You can use the parent document to create hierarchies, or you can use tags, like you said  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:59): oh, okay...  I'll associate them with a parent doc  
jumpkick - (10/05/2009 23:59): that's probably more natural
